Fly in to San Juan, get a car rental and drive route 3 east to Luquillo.

El Yunque Tropical Rainforest

Las Cabezas de San Juan Nature Reserve

value: content=A decent public beach with a few nice food shacks located a few feet from the beach.
content=Lolita's is an excellent Mexican restaurant with very fair prices.

content=Located along a wavy stretch of beach Luquillo Sunrise Beach Inn is a very pleasant hotel with a friendly staff, spacious rooms, most with a balcony and a few extra amenities such as free use of beach chairs and towels.  The beach out front is very nice, especially as the hotel does its best to keep it trash-free.  It is frequented by surfers since there isn't a reef to break the waves.  Walk west a very short distance and you will find a nice, quiet beach with reef protection.
directions=beachfront, near Calle Veve Calzada, next door to the Sunrise Beach Inn

content=1,500 square feet rental unit with a fully equipped kitchen, wrap-around terrace offering all around ocean views and a rain forest view from the back. Assigned parking, pool, and pets are allowed.

Beautiful beach front/ocean front apartment. Fully furnished. Located in the town of Luquillo, Puerto Rico. 4 miles from the base of the Caribbean Tropical Forest (El Yunque). 4 miles from the Rio Mar Westin Hotel. Adjacent to the Blue Flag Luquillo Public Beach. 30 miles from downtown San Juan.
301.455.5501
